title: imp?
body: Do you think imp can comeback as best adc in worlds?

replies.body: hard to tell...they looked really crips in the LPL playoffs, but since the season started they didn´t really find their game. I think he´d be a perfect fit for OMG though, he´s still better than UZI and they would do very well with a real playmaking ADC.
Not if Deft or Bang have anything to say about it.
